General.Name: Clean Earth Acquisitions Corp
General.Description: Clean Earth Acquisitions Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It focuses on acquiring companies in the clean energy ecosystem, including carbon, hydrogen, sustainable agriculture, and renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Bee Cave, Texas.
General.Address: Building R, Bee Cave, TX, United States, 78738
